Document.Focus: Repair of webbed fingers or toes

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Repair of webbed fingers or toes
QAPair.Answer: Repair of webbed fingers or toes is surgery to fix webbing of the toes, fingers, or both. The middle and ring fingers or the second and third toes are most often affected. Most often this surgery is done when a child is between 6 months and 2 years old.
